FuncDef:
The service input command applies a specified service type to a PVC.
The undo service input command deletes the configuration.
By default, UBR is applied to PVCs.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a service type.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To limit traffic entering an ATM network within a proper range, specify a service type for PVCs and specify parameters for the service type. To apply a specified service type to a PVC in the outbound or inbound direction, run the service input command. This helps prevent the impact of burst traffic and ensures efficient usage of network resources by implementing ATM traffic shaping.
Prerequisites
Before applying a service type to a PVC, run the atm service input commadn in the system view to create a service type for PVCs.
